email_args.subject: Your Intro Coffee with Harper - 10 Nov
email_args.body:
Hi Benson,

This is a confirmation for your introductory coffee with Harper on 10 Nov at 9:30am.

You'll be meeting Harper Solis, your Hiring Manager.



See you soon,
Rachel
HR Team

email_args.subject: Intro Coffee with New Hire Benson - 10 Nov
email_args.body:
Hi Harper,

A reminder for your intro coffee with Benson Sim on 10 Nov at 9:30am.

Benson is the incoming employee for the position of Business Process Coordinator. He brings strong experience in workflow coordination, SOP documentation, and structured task execution. He is highly organised, detail-focused, and eager to learn our internal reporting tools.

This meeting should help set expectations around documentation workflows and initial onboarding checkpoints.

Thanks,
Rachel

email_args.subject: Your Intro Coffee with Harper - 10 Nov
email_args.body:
Hi Jerry,

This is a confirmation for your introductory coffee with Harper on 10 Nov at 10:30am.

You'll be meeting Harper Solis, your Hiring Manager.

This session is informal and aimed at helping you ease into the team.

Welcome again,
Rachel
HR Team

email_args.subject: Intro Coffee with New Hire Jerry - 10 Nov
email_args.body:
Hi Harper,

Reminder for your intro coffee with Jerry Lee on 10 Nov at 10:30am.

Jerry is the incoming employee for the position of Operations Planning Analyst. He brings over six years of operations planning experience, strong KPI reporting capabilities, and solid cross-functional coordination skills. He has a structured, analytical working style that aligns well with upcoming planning cycles.

This session will help establish expectations for his onboarding and initial reporting workflows.

Thanks,
Rachel

email_args.subject: Reminder: Onboarding Check-In with Harper - 21 Nov
email_args.body:
Hi Bryan,

A reminder about your onboarding check-in with Harper on 21 Nov at 11:00am.

You will be reviewing early observations for the two new hires:
- Benson Sim - detail-focused, strong with documentation, may need guidance on internal reporting tools.
- Jerry Lee - experienced in planning, strong with KPI reporting, will benefit from onboarding into internal dashboards.

Please prepare any notes on access, workflow familiarity, or early support items.

Thanks,
Rachel

email_args.subject: Onboarding Check-In with Bryan - 21 Nov
email_args.body:
Hi Harper,

This is your reminder for the onboarding check-in with Bryan on 21 Nov at 11:00am.

Discussion points include onboarding progress for Benson and Jerry:
- Benson: strong documentation habits, structured communication style, may need support in learning reporting tools.
- Jerry: experienced planner with strong analytical skills, will benefit from early clarity on internal workflows.

Let me know if you'd like any additional notes before the check-in.

Best,
Rachel
HR Team
